item.title: Alumni Projects
item.description: Pittsburgh, PA The Trouble With Dead Boyfriends, winner of 2017 Premiere Premieres! in Chicago will have a staged reading, with new songs and script, on March 4th at 8pm in the Carnegie Mellon University CUC Black Box Theater. Written by SnS alumnus Alex Petti (‘15) and Annie Pulsipher (CFA ‘17), and featuring performances by SnS alumni Marina Devaux, Andrew Abrahamson, and Alex Petti. Proceeds will be going to CMU School of Dramaâ€™s Senior Showcase.
